alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Santa Barbara County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 02 at 1:03PM PST until March 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches possible. Highest in the Los Angeles County mountains. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Mountains, Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Road closures are possible during this event, including Interstate 5 over the Grapevine, Highway 33 through the Grapevine, and Highway 2 through the San Gabriel Mountains. Roads may remain icy and impassable well after snowfall has ended.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Santa Barbara County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
